rows.name: Ghostly Voices
rows.description: Daemonic darkly seductive voices whisper within Willpower yards; everyone who hears them must pass a Challenging(+0) Cool Test or gain 1 Corruption point.

rows.name: Mindnumb
rows.description: Uncontrolled magic partially burns out your casting ability. Your skill advances in Language(Magick) and Channeling are halved for the next 24 hours.

rows.name: Aethyric Shock
rows.description: You suffer 1d10 wounds ignoring Toughness Bonus or Armour: Every nail on your body blackens and wrenches free, the energies of your Wind scour you, your blood momentarily boils inside your body, etc. Pass an Average(+20) Endurance Test or gain a Stunned condition.

rows.name: Following Winds
rows.description: Your Wind follows you for the next 1d10 hours. This is noticeable and difficult to explain to any suspicious bystanders. Shyish might cause plant life nearby you to wither and die, Aqshy the eruption of small fires, etc.

rows.name: Aethyric Attack
rows.description: You suffer 1 Critical Wound to a random hit location as uncontrolled magical energies ravage your form.

rows.name: Soulfire
rows.description: Gain 1d5 Ablaze conditions as you are wreathed in unholy flames.

rows.name: Voice of Madness
rows.description: You gabble unintelligibly for 1d10 rounds. During this time, you cannot communicate verbally or make Casting tests.

rows.name: Chaotic Winds
rows.description: Chaos blows through your spell ingredients. Any spell cast using them suffers from Malignant Influence.

rows.name: Ragdoll
rows.description: You levitate briefly before being flung 1d10 yards through the air in a random direction, taking 1d10 wounds ignoring Armour and falling Prone on landing.

rows.name: Limbfrozen
rows.description: One randomly determined limb is frozen in place for 1d10 hours. It is useless as if amputated.

rows.name: Craven Familiar
rows.description: A lesser daemon, such as an Imp, appears from the Aethyr, beckoned by your flawed casting.

rows.name: Chaotic Foresight
rows.description: The Winds bring dark visions of the future. You gain a pool of 1d10 temporary Fortune points. Every time you spend one of these points, gain 1 Corruption point. These points last until the end of the session.

rows.name: Wracked
rows.description: You are overwhelmed with pain, taking 1 Stunned condition. Make a Very Hard(-30) Endurance test or fall Prone.

rows.name: Power Drain
rows.description: Your power surges like a breaking dam, bleeding fully into the Winds. You lose your ability to cast magic for the next 1d10 minutes. Your lost energy causes minor effects of Witchery as it travels.

rows.name: Suffocation
rows.description: You immediately begin to Suffocate as your throat swells, is suddenly clogged with blood or pus, or your tongue momentarily stretches back down your throat, etc.

rows.name: Aethyric Feedback
rows.description: Magic surges around you, causing fearsome stigmata. Everyone within a number of yards equal to your Willpower suffers 1 Wound and must make a Challenging(+0) Cool Test or take a Broken Condition. If there are no other creatures within this distance, you immediately suffer 2d10 Wounds.

rows.name: Foul Enfeeblement
rows.description: The Winds carry a strand of Chaos, choking your soul and bringing you to your knees. Gain 1 Corruption point, 1 Fatigued Condition, and the Prone condition.

rows.name: Double Trouble
rows.description: The Winds whisk away your spell

rows.name: Storm of Chaos
rows.description: Roll on the Minor Miscast table. You and the 1d10 nearest creatures suffer this effect.

rows.name: Trick of Fate
rows.description: Roll on the Catastrophic table instead.
